precondition: The "My Computer" window is open and the "CDROM (D:)" icon is visible.
expected_results: The contents of "My Computer" window's right pane will be updated, displaying the "CDROM (D:)" drive information.

action: Click the close button of the "CDROM (D:)" window.

precondition: The "Free AOL & Unlimited..." shortcut is visible on the desktop.
action: Left Click on the "Free AOL & Unlimited..." shortcut on the desktop.
expected_results: The "Creating a New Profile" window will appear. This window contains buttons for "Back", "Next", "Finish", and "Cancel".

precondition: The dialog box titled 'Enter your Name and Email Address' is open.
expected_results: The 'Enter your Name and Email Address' dialog box will close, and the 'Creating a New Profile' dialog box will become visible.

precondition: The "Enter your Name and Email Address" dialog box is displayed.
action: Type the letter "o" into the "Full Name" field.
expected_results: The letter "o" will appear in the "Full Name" field.

precondition: The "Enter your Name and Email Address" dialog box is open.
expected_results: No visible change will occur in the user interface.

precondition: The "Enter your Name and Email Address" dialog box is open.
expected_results: No visible change will occur in the dialog box.

precondition: The "Enter your Name and Email Address" dialog box is open.
expected_results: No visible change will occur in the user interface.

precondition: The "Enter your Name and Email Address" dialog box is open. The "Full Name" text field is visible.
action: Type the keys 'l' and then 'i' into the "Full Name" text field.
expected_results: The characters "li" will appear in the "Full Name" text field.

precondition: The "Enter your Name and Email Address" dialog box is open with two text fields labeled "Full Name" and "Email Address (if available)".
expected_results: No visible changes will occur in the GUI.

precondition: The "Enter your Name and Email Address" dialog box is open. The "Full Name" text field is active.
expected_results: The letter "e" will appear in the "Full Name" text field.

precondition: The "Enter your Name and Email Address" dialog box is open. The "Full Name" text field is active.
action: Type the letter "s" using your keyboard.
expected_results: The letter "s" will appear in the "Full Name" text field.

precondition: The "Enter your Name and Email Address" dialog box is open. The "Full Name" field is empty.
action: Type the letter "o" using the keyboard.
expected_results: The letter "o" will appear in the "Full Name" field.

precondition: The "Enter your Name and Email Address" dialog box is open. The 'Next >' button is active.
expected_results: The "Enter your Name and Email Address" dialog box will close, and the "Choose a Name and Directory for your Profile" dialog box will open.
